column4: ""Here to win the Hand's tourney;" Lord Beric shouted back as the crowd cheered.  Ned"
"about Jeyne.  Later a hedge knight in a checkered cloak disgraced himself by killing Beric"
"my word to Gregor's keep. Twenty of my own guards shall go with you. Lord Beric"
"glad Father didn't pick him."  "Lord Beric is as much a hero as Ser Loras"
"as Ser Loras. He's ever so brave and gallant."  "I suppose;" Sansa said doubtfully. Beric"
"as Ser Loras. He's ever so brave and gallant."  "I suppose;" Sansa said doubtfully. Beric"
"Beric Dondarrion was handsome enough; but he was awfully old; almost twenty-two; the Knight of Flowers"
"Flowers would have been much better. Of course; Jeyne had been in love with Lord Beric"
"Flowers would have been much better. Of course; Jeyne had been in love with Lord Beric"
"in love with Lord Beric ever since she had first glimpsed him in the lists. Sansa"
"stag of the king flew from the high staff; the direwolf of Stark and Lord Beric"
"cloaks.  Alyn carried the Stark banner. When she saw him rein in beside Lord Beric"
"banner. When she saw him rein in beside Lord Beric to exchange words; it made Sansa"
"rein in beside Lord Beric to exchange words; it made Sansa feel ever so proud. Alyn"
"Beric to exchange words; it made Sansa feel ever so proud. Alyn was handsomer than Jory"
"Father send them to hunt down Jaime Lannister?"  Sansa sighed. "They rode with Lord Beric"
"Father send them to hunt down Jaime Lannister?"  Sansa sighed. "They rode with Lord Beric"
"hunt down Jaime Lannister?"  Sansa sighed. "They rode with Lord Beric; to behead Ser Gregor"
"Sansa sighed. "They rode with Lord Beric; to behead Ser Gregor Clegane." She turned to Septa"
"turned to Septa Mordane; who was eating porridge with a wooden spoon. "Septa; will Lord Beric"
"Mordane; who was eating porridge with a wooden spoon. "Septa; will Lord Beric spike Ser Gregor"
"in his arms. "Let him write all the letters to the queen he likes. Lord Beric"
"him write all the letters to the queen he likes. Lord Beric rides beneath the king"
"to the queen he likes. Lord Beric rides beneath the king's own banner. If Lord Tywin"
"Beric was off to behead his brother."  "Even a blind man could see the Hound"
"pair of Ned Stark's afterthoughts making a nuisance of themselves by harassing my foraging parties. Beric"
"Tyrell. Lord Mace Tyrell; his brothers; uncles; sons. The red priest; Thoros of Myr. Lord Beric"

"Myr. Lord Beric Dondarrion. Lady Lysa Arryn and her son; the little Lord Robert. Lord Hoster"
"Beric Dondarrion continue to plague our foraging parties. To our east we have the Arryns; Stannis"
